content: pattern notes this throw is worked flat from end to end using the overlay mosaic technique the colorwork designs are created by working back loop only single_crochet stitches in working row and front loop long double_crochet stitches in unworked front loops 2 row below colors alternate each row work all row with one color and right side facing you will not turn your work leave a 6 length of yarn at the beginning and end of each row in each color these lengths will become the fringe single_crochet stitches are worked in back loops only blo except for the first 2 and last 2 stitches of each row the stitch count will remain the same throughout the pattern includes both written and charted instructions read the chart from bottom to top right to left each square represents 1 stitch materials premier® yarns anti-pilling everyday® worsted 100% anti-pilling acrylic 3 5oz/100g 180yds/165m c1 100-69 deep teal 6 balls premier® yarns anti-pilling everyday® painterly 100% anti-pilling acrylic 3 5oz/100g 180yds/165m c2 2119-04 jam session 7 balls hook us size h-8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle skills/techniques used in this pattern chain single and double_crochet stitches single_crochet join overlay mosaic crochet technique working in front and back loops of stitches
